```{r Import Data}
file <- read.csv(file='PerformancePredictions/TXN.csv', header=TRUE, sep=',')
file.df <- data.frame(file)
head(file.df)
```

```{r Summarize Data}
summary(file.df)

# Check for missing values
sum(is.na(file.df))

cor(file.df[2:7])
```

```{r}
library(pracma)
xtime <- linspace(1,1259, n=1259)
highy <- file.df[,"High"]

plot(xtime,highy)
abline(lm(highy~xtime))
```
